sections.heading: Overview
content:
Carl K. Winter, PhD ,
is director of the FoodSafe Program at the University of California at Davis. His major areas of interest are the
toxicological consequences of pesticide residues and other contaminants in
foods, including risk assessment, regulation and public policy of pesticide
residues and contaminants, naturally occurring food toxins, and bio-analytical
toxicology.

Winter is an innovator in communicating about food safety; his outreach
efforts include Food Safety
Music , parodies of popular songs. He has produced two CDs, "Sanitized
for Your Consumption" and "Stayin' Alive" and performs around the
country.
